title: AFK games
body: My last game was the first game in 8 games without someone AFK on my team. There is something seriously wrong with this game if you RIOT does nothing about it. Do more RIOT or else.

replies.body:
Lets rule out the most obvious reasons to why a person is AFK or didn't connect

1. They lost lane
2. His/Her team is feeding
3. They have to go

Did you ever think that just maybe that person and a very good excuse to why they left?

1. Something very important came up and they had to leave immediately
2. Someone called them and something had happened
3. Their power went out for the night
4. Their computer over heated
5. They are home looking after their siblings and something happened
6. Worst case scenario there's an intruder

Just because someone leaves the game doesn't mean they should be banned permanently. If you're sick of people leaving ranked (solo/duo) or normal's why don't you make some friends or if you have friends play with them and make sure you play with 5.
